price: 21. Raaca kuwo aan idin weydiisan wax abaal gud ah, oo hanuunsan.
arabic: ٱتَّبِعُواْ مَن لَّا يَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ أَجۡرٗا وَهُم مُّهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ittabiʿū man lā yasalukum ajran wahum muh'tadūna
